briefTitle: Study of Oral Bisphosphonate for Osteopenic Women Treated With Adjuvant Aromatase Inhibitors
officialTitle: A Single--blind, Randomized, Placebo--controlled Phase II Study to Evaluate the Impact of Oral Bisphosphonate Treatment on Bone Mineral Density in Osteopenic Women Receiving Adjuvant Aromatase Inhibitors - BONADIUV Trial
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Lumbar spine and trochanter T-score mean difference as measure of BMD variation
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Diagnosis of hormone-receptor positive early breast cancer
* Menopausal status
* Age \< 75 years
* Written informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Premenopausal status at time of randomization
* Comorbidities with increased risk of osteoporosis (primary hyperparathyroidism, hyperthyroidism, rheumatoid arthritis)
* BMI \< 18
* Chronic use of steroids
* Use of bisphosphonates at time of randomization
* Psychiatric disorders
